name: Panasonic Alkaline Battery AA-4, 1.5V
description: Panasonic Alkaline AA batteries protect power for up to 10 years, when unused and stored properly and 12 times longer lasting than ordinary zinc-carbon batteries.This batteries are ideal for TV remote, alarm clocks, clocks, flashlight, battery powered toys, beard trimmers & shavers, digital cameras, video flash, photo flash, wireless keyboard, wireless mouse and other everyday devices. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
